definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
to perch/to rest (of birds)/to dwell/to live/to stay
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The North American Amphibian Monitoring Program is the country’s largest frog-counting system.
sentences.chinese: 北美兩棲動物監測中心是美國最大的青蛙統計機構。
青蛙和蠑螈都是兩棲動物。

sentences.english: It is a phosphorus-free calcium supplement for reptiles and amphibians.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個磷遊離鈣補充爬行動物和兩棲動物。

sentences.english: For the arboreal reptiles and amphibians, to create a three-dimensional habitat.
sentences.chinese: 爲樹棲爬行動物和兩棲動物，創建一個三維棲息地。

sentences.english: "We're working on amphibians now, " says Sinervo.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在開始研究兩棲動物。

sentences.english: One reson why the number of amphibians is declining is that their habitats have been destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 兩棲動物數量減少的原因之一是棲息地遭到破壞。

sentences.english: The sealed bottom is for setting making for amphibian.
sentences.chinese: 密封式底部，可供兩棲動物造景之用。

sentences.english: Fishes having paired fins resembling limbs and regarded as ancestral to amphibians.
sentences.chinese: 有一對類似於腳的鰭且被視爲是兩棲動物祖先的魚類。

sentences.english: Why does the speaker choose that amphibian as her representative of a public creature?
sentences.chinese: 詩人爲何選擇這個兩棲動物作爲公衆人物的代表？

sentences.english: Frogs, like many amphibians, also hibernate when it gets cold.
sentences.chinese: 青蛙，像許多兩棲動物，也冬眠當天氣變冷。

sentences.english: The living space of the amphibian is much larger than that of others.
sentences.chinese: 兩棲動物的生活空間要比單棲動物大得多。
